DOC.brief_summary: This single center study monitor developmental progress PPHN patient receive iv sildenafil study A1481276 . Two visit conduct , 12 24 month follow end study drug infusion .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-Interventional Follow Up Study For Subjects Who Received Sildenafil Persistent Pulmonary Hypertension Newborn ( PPHN )
DOC.detailed_description: This study monitor developmental progress PPHN patient 2 year follow study treatment , use Bayley III Hammersmith tool . Data explore descriptive statistic .
DOC.criteria: Any subject receive sildenafil treatment study A1481276 . Signed date informed consent document legal guardian . Any subject receive sildenafil treatment study A1481276 .
DOC.keyword: PPHN ; development progress PPHN ; developmental progress sildenafil .
